00053     mChannels = 1;

00060 #define VS_AUDIOSAMPLES_BUFFER_PADDING 64
00061   void
00062   AudioSamples :: allocInternalSamples()
00063   {
00064     if (!mSamples)
00065     {
00066       int32_t bufSize = mRequestedSamples * getSampleSize() +
00067           VS_AUDIOSAMPLES_BUFFER_PADDING;
00068 
00069       mSamples = IBuffer::make(this, bufSize);
00070       if (!mSamples)
00071         throw std::bad_alloc();
00072       setBufferType(mSampleFmt, mSamples.value());
00073 
00074       if (mSamples)
00075       {
00076         //void * buf = retval->mSamples->getBytes(0, bufSize);
00077         //don't set to zero; this means the memory is uninitialized
00078         //which helps find bugs with valgrind
00079         //memset(buf, 0, bufSize);
00080         mNumSamples = 0;
00081         VS_LOG_TRACE("Created AudioSamples(%d bytes)", bufSize);
00082       }
00083       
00084     }
00085   }
00086   
00087   int32_t
00088   AudioSamples :: ensureCapacity(int32_t capacity)
00089   {
00090     if (mSamples && 
00091         mSamples->getBufferSize() < (capacity + VS_AUDIOSAMPLES_BUFFER_PADDING))
00092     {
00093       // crap; need to ditch and re-recreate
00094       mSamples=0;
00095     }
00096     int32_t sampleSize = getSampleSize();
00097     int32_t requiredSamples;
00098     if (sampleSize > 0)
00099       requiredSamples = capacity / getSampleSize();
00100     else
00101       requiredSamples = AVCODEC_MAX_AUDIO_FRAME_SIZE;
00102     mRequestedSamples = requiredSamples;
00103     
00104     return 0;
00105   }
00106   short*
00107   AudioSamples :: getRawSamples(uint32_t startingSample)
00108   {
00109     short *retval = 0;
00110     allocInternalSamples();
00111     if (mSamples)
00112     {
00113       uint32_t startingOffset = startingSample*getSampleSize();
00114       uint32_t bufLen = (mNumSamples*getSampleSize())-startingOffset;
00115       retval = (short*)mSamples->getBytes(startingOffset, bufLen);
00116     }
00117     return retval;
00118   }

00120   AudioSamples*
00121   AudioSamples :: make(uint32_t numSamples,
00122       uint32_t numChannels)
00123   {
00124     return make(numSamples, numChannels, IAudioSamples::FMT_S16);
00125   }
00126   
00127   AudioSamples*
00128   AudioSamples :: make(uint32_t numSamples,
00129       uint32_t numChannels,
00130       IAudioSamples::Format format)
00131   {
00132     AudioSamples *retval=0;
00133     if (numSamples > 0 && numChannels > 0)
00134     {
00135       retval = AudioSamples::make();
00136       if (retval)
00137       {
00138         // FFMPEG actually requires a minimum buffer size, so we
00139         // make sure we're always at least that large.
00140         retval->mChannels = numChannels;
00141         retval->mSampleFmt = format;
00142         retval->mRequestedSamples = numSamples;
00143       }
00144     }
00145     return retval;
00146   }
00147   
00148   AudioSamples*
00149   AudioSamples :: make(IBuffer* buffer, int channels,
00150       IAudioSamples::Format format)
00151   {
00152     if (!buffer)
00153       return 0;
00154     if (format == IAudioSamples::FMT_NONE)
00155       return 0;
00156     if (channels < 0)
00157       return 0;
00158     if (buffer->getBufferSize()<= 0)
00159       return 0;
00160     
00161     int bytesPerSample = IAudioSamples::findSampleBitDepth(format)/8*channels;
00162     int samplesRequested = buffer->getBufferSize()/bytesPerSample;
00163     AudioSamples* retval = 0;
00164     try
00165     {
00166       retval = make(samplesRequested, channels, format);
00167       if (!retval)
00168         return 0;
00169       retval->setData(buffer);
00170     }
00171     catch (std::bad_alloc &e)
00172     {
00173       VS_REF_RELEASE(retval);
00174       throw e;
00175     }
00176     catch (std::exception& e)
00177     {
00178       VS_LOG_DEBUG("error: %s", e.what());
00179       VS_REF_RELEASE(retval);
00180     }
00181 
00182     return retval;
00183   }
00184 
00185   void
00186   AudioSamples :: setData(com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer* buffer)
00187   {
00188     if (!buffer) return;
00189     mSamples.reset(buffer, true);
00190     setBufferType(mSampleFmt, buffer);
00191   }

00223   uint32_t
00224   AudioSamples :: getMaxBufferSize()
00225   {
00226     allocInternalSamples();
00227     return mSamples->getBufferSize()-VS_AUDIOSAMPLES_BUFFER_PADDING;
00228   }

00230   uint32_t
00231   AudioSamples :: getSampleBitDepth()
00232   {
00233     return IAudioSamples::findSampleBitDepth(mSampleFmt);
00234   }
00235 
00236   uint32_t
00237   AudioSamples :: getSampleSize()
00238   {
00239     uint32_t bits = getSampleBitDepth();
00240     if (bits < 8)
00241       bits = 8;
00242 
00243     return bits/8 * getChannels();
00244   }
00245 
00246   com::xuggle::ferry::IBuffer*
00247   AudioSamples :: getData()
00248   {
00249     allocInternalSamples();
00250     IBuffer* retval = mSamples.get();
00251     if (!retval)
00252       throw std::bad_alloc();
00253     return retval;
00254   }
00255 
00256   uint32_t
00257   AudioSamples :: getMaxSamples()
00258   {
00259     return getMaxBufferSize() / getSampleSize();
00260   }

00262   void
00263   AudioSamples :: setComplete(bool complete, uint32_t numSamples,
00264       int32_t sampleRate, int32_t channels, Format format,
00265       int64_t pts)
00266   {
00267     mIsComplete = complete;
00268     if (channels <= 0)
00269       channels = 1;
00270 
00271     mChannels = channels;
00272     mSampleRate = sampleRate;
00273     mSampleFmt = format;
00274     if (mSamples)
00275       // if we've allocated a buffer, reset the type
00276       setBufferType(mSampleFmt, mSamples.value());
00277 
00278     if (mIsComplete)
00279     {
00280       mNumSamples = FFMIN(numSamples,
00281           getMaxBufferSize()/(getSampleSize()));
00282 #if 0
00283       {
00284         short* samps = this->getRawSamples(0);
00285         for(uint32_t i = 0; i < mNumSamples;i++)
00286         {
00287           int32_t samp = samps[i];
00288           VS_LOG_DEBUG("i: %d; samp: %d", i, samp);
00289         }
00290       }
00291 #endif // VS_DEBUG
00292     } else {
00293       mNumSamples = 0;
00294     }
00295     setPts(pts);
00296   }

00310   int64_t
00311   AudioSamples :: getNextPts()
00312   {
00313     int64_t retval = Global::NO_PTS;
00314     if (mPts != Global::NO_PTS)
00315       retval = mPts + IAudioSamples::samplesToDefaultPts(this->getNumSamples(), this->getSampleRate());
00316 
00317     return retval;
00318   }

00320   int32_t
00321   AudioSamples :: setSample(uint32_t sampleIndex, int32_t channel, Format format, int32_t sample)
00322   {
00323     int32_t retval = -1;
00324     try {
00325       if (channel < 0 || channel >= mChannels)
00326         throw std::invalid_argument("cannot setSample for given channel");
00327       if (format != FMT_S16)
00328         throw std::invalid_argument("only support format: FMT_S16");
00329       if (sampleIndex >= this->getMaxSamples())
00330         throw std::invalid_argument("sampleIndex out of bounds");
00331 
00332       short *rawSamples = this->getRawSamples(0);
00333       if (!rawSamples)
00334         throw std::runtime_error("no samples buffer set in AudioSamples");
00335 
00336       rawSamples[sampleIndex*mChannels + channel] = (short)sample;
00337       retval = 0;
00338     }
00339     catch (std::exception & e)
00340     {
00341       VS_LOG_DEBUG("Error: %s", e.what());
00342       retval = -1;
00343     }
00344     return retval;
00345   }
00346 
00347   int32_t
00348   AudioSamples :: getSample(uint32_t sampleIndex, int32_t channel, Format format)
00349   {
00350     int32_t retval = 0;
00351     try
00352     {
00353       if (channel < 0 || channel >= mChannels)
00354         throw std::invalid_argument("cannot getSample for given channel");
00355       if (format != FMT_S16)
00356         throw std::invalid_argument("only support format: FMT_S16");
00357       if (sampleIndex >= this->getNumSamples())
00358         throw std::invalid_argument("sampleIndex out of bounds");
00359 
00360       short *rawSamples = this->getRawSamples(0);
00361       if (!rawSamples)
00362         throw std::runtime_error("no samples buffer set in AudioSamples");
00363 
00364       retval = rawSamples[sampleIndex*mChannels + channel];
00365     }
00366     catch(std::exception & e)
00367     {
00368       VS_LOG_DEBUG("Error: %s", e.what());
00369       retval = 0;
00370     }
00371     return retval;
00372   }
00373 
00374   void
00375   AudioSamples :: setBufferType(IAudioSamples::Format format,
00376       IBuffer* buffer)
00377   {
00378     if (!buffer)
00379       return;
00380     switch(format)
00381     {
00382       case FMT_FLT:
00383         buffer->setType(IBuffer::IBUFFER_FLT32);
00384         break;
00385       case FMT_S16:
00386         buffer->setType(IBuffer::IBUFFER_SINT16);
00387         break;
00388       case FMT_S24:
00389         // Dear god.. don't use this type of audio
00390         buffer->setType(IBuffer::IBUFFER_UINT8);
00391         break;
00392       case FMT_S32:
00393         buffer->setType(IBuffer::IBUFFER_SINT32);
00394         break;
00395       case FMT_U8:
00396         buffer->setType(IBuffer::IBUFFER_UINT8);
00397         break;
00398       default:
00399         break;
00400     }
00401   }
